amendment.description: To promote a thorough investigation of the United Nations Oil-for-Food Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3440 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3440 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To promote a thorough investigation of the United Nations Oil-for-Food Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3440 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3440 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign.
